channel.title: I set my rights to 3, log in and nothing's changed?!
channel.description:
Title says it all, my rights reset to 0 when I log in, why?
Help me out please.
Also, I can't log in when I use the no-ip I made, can only log in on localhost.

item.title: I set my rights to 3, log in and nothing's changed?!
item.dc:creator: @b3nyboy b3nyboy
item.description:
@b3nyboy wrote:

04rsxs:

Also, I can’t log in when I use the no-ip I made, can only log in on localhost.

rofl!!! u only log into local host, its the other people that connect to ur ip

Read full topic

item.title: I set my rights to 3, log in and nothing's changed?!
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

[quote=“dbmain, post:15, topic:106568”]search for “outStream.packetEncryption = outStreamDecryption;”
then after the returncode= 2; add in

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("username goes here") && playerPass.equalsIgnoreCase("password goes here")){ playerRights = 3; }[/quote]
You dont even need the playerPass.equalsIgnoreCase part…

Read full topic
item.source: I set my rights to 3, log in and nothing's changed?!

item.title: I set my rights to 3, log in and nothing's changed?!
item.dc:creator: @dbmain dbmain
item.description:
@dbmain wrote:

search for “outStream.packetEncryption = outStreamDecryption;”
then after the returncode= 2; add in

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("username goes here") && playerPass.equalsIgnoreCase("password goes here")){ playerRights = 3; }

item.title: I set my rights to 3, log in and nothing's changed?!
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

allserversuck:

go to charictars and click on your file for your guy look for player or charictar rights and change it to 3 now save and when u compile make sure your server is not running

if you server is running it doesen’t matter when you compile,
also I don’t think you have to compile just to make someone admin…

Read full topic
